```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(AICcmodavg)
library(survival)
library(apaTables)
library(devtools)
library(rstatix)
```

```{r}
print(getwd())
data <- read.csv(file = './data/rqa_results-4.csv')
head(data)
```
```{r}
summary(data)
```
```{r}
one.way <- aov(recurrence_rate ~ high_performance, data = data)

summary(one.way)
```
```{r}
for (val in colnames(data))
{
print(val)
one.way <- aov(data[, c(val)] ~ high_performance, data = data)

print(summary(one.way))
}

```
```{r}
print(data[, c('recurrence_rate')])
```
```{r}
pairwise.t.test(data[, c('divergence')], data[, c('diversity')], p.adj = "none")
```
```{r}
for (val in list('entropy', 'longest_diagonal_line', 'average_diagonal_line', 'no_messages', 'time', 'divergence', 'revise_score')){
  print(val)
  y = data[, c(val)]
  x = data[, c('diversity')]
  print(summary(res <- aov(y ~ factor(x), data = data)))
  print(pairwise.t.test(y, x, p.adj = "bonferroni"))
  plot(x, y, col = "blue", main = paste(val, "plotted against diversity", sep=" "), xlab = "diversity", ylab = val)
  abline(lm(y ~ x))
```


```{r}
for (val in list('recurrence_rate', 'longest_diagonal_line', 'divergence', 'time', 'determinism', 'laminarity', 'entropy', 'revise_score', 'average_diagonal_line', 'no_messages')){
  print(val)
  y = data[, c(val)]
  x = data[, c('diversity')]
  print(res <- kruskal.test(y ~ factor(x), data = data))
  print(pairwise.wilcox.test(y, factor(x),
                 p.adjust.method = "BH", correct=FALSE))
  plot(x, y, col = "blue", main = paste(val, "plotted against diversity", sep=" "), xlab = "diversity", ylab = val)
  abline(lm(y ~ x))
}
```


```{r}
data %>% kruskal_effsize(no_messages ~ diversity)
```

```{r}
# Install devtools package if necessary
if(!"devtools" %in% rownames(installed.packages())) install.packages("devtools")

# Install the stable development verions from GitHub
devtools::install_github("crsh/papaja")

# Install the latest development snapshot from GitHub
devtools::install_github("crsh/papaja@devel")
```


```{r}
for (val in list('recurrence_rate', 'longest_diagonal_line', 'divergence', 'time', 'determinism', 'laminarity', 'entropy', 'revise_score', 'average_diagonal_line', 'no_messages')){
  library(apaTables)
  anova_out <- aov(data[, c(val)] ~ factor(diversity), data = data)
  apa.aov.table(anova_out, filename = paste(val, "table.doc", sep=" "), table.number = 4)
}
```
```{r}
tukey.test <- TukeyHSD(anova_out)
tukey.test
```
```{r}
tapply(data$entropy, data$diversity, summary)
